purpose.summary: This PSB source defines the Program Specification Block for COBOL program PAUTBUNL, specifying a database PCB PAUTBPCB for accessing IMS database DBPAUTP0 with PROCOPT=GOTP (GO=Get Next using SSAs + TP=IMS TM mode), KEYLEN=14. It senses root segment PAUTSUM0 (PARENT=0) and child segment PAUTDTL1 (PARENT=PAUTSUM0). The PSBGEN generates the control block for DL/I calls in the application (lines 17-22).

inputs.name: DBPAUTP0
inputs.description: IMS database accessed via PCB PAUTBPCB

inputs.name: PAUTSUM0
inputs.description: Root segment (PARENT=0) sensed by the PCB

inputs.name: PAUTDTL1
inputs.description: Child segment (PARENT=PAUTSUM0) sensed by the PCB

business_rules.description: PCB senses root segment PAUTSUM0 with no parent
PCB senses detail segment PAUTDTL1 as child of PAUTSUM0
PROCOPT=GOTP enables Get Next segment retrieval using SSAs in IMS TM/TP mode
business_rules.logic_summary: GO=Get Next using SSAs; TP=Path calls allowed only under IMS TM
